alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Lafayette; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 10:01AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lafayette, northeastern Acadia, west central St. Martin and south central St. Landry Parishes through 1030 AM CDT... At 1001 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cankton, or near Carencro, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Scott, Breaux Bridge, Rayne, Carencro, Church Point, Broussard, Sunset, Duson, Grand Coteau, Cankton, Mire and Branch. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 88 and 113. Interstate 49 between mile markers 1 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Acadia; Lafayette; St. Landry; Upper St. Martin
